data.name: 能量塌陷
data.detailed_description:
-This is a Rougelike shooting game with a spaceship as the core

-After the "Energy Collapse" event, the "Truth Society", a pioneer organization exploring the universe, fell into the pollution of mysterious energy. When the truth loses its sanity in this sudden energy wave, chaos and disasters also follow. In the endless wandering and hesitation, your fleet encounters the "Dawn" class base dock ship, the legacy of the truth society, and begins to set the Milky Way out of order.

-Every departure in the game is a journey to life and death. Players need to lead your ship to explore, search, and research in the vast sea of ​​stars, meet the challenge and gradually become stronger, and regain the contaminated land step by step. Build your strongest ship and regain the glory of mankind!


Battle


-Players need to observe and be familiar with the module distribution and structure of each type of enemy, and use their own weapons to give priority to destroying modules with greater threats to win.


Explore


-
Use the space sensor on the starship to explore ancient planet remnants, dark and mysterious mineral planets, and constantly shuttle between galaxies to make the fleet as strong as possible!

- The signal wave emitted by the space scanner will attract the attention of the "unidentified fleet". When the exploration alert reaches the critical value, the player will face the difficult and powerful "unidentified fleet" elite.

- There are many new energy sources, technologies, weapons, and even undocumented terrifying enemies in the vast universe. They are hidden in various planets, to obtain, to contain, to defeat, until they reach the end.

data.short_description: The sci-fi rougelike game "Energy Collapse" mainly tells the story of human beings marching in despair after the pollution catastrophe caused by mysterious energy. starting from "Dawn". The dock ship set off for deep space exploration time after time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or newer
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
